website_summaries.verdict: The Nikon Coolpix S6000's features and performance are very good for its price, but its photos are best suited for small prints and Web use.
pros: nice features, good design for the money
cons: Noticeably soft photos with lots of purple fringing

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact camera with great options
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a simple camera for just quick point and shoot photos. It's compact size is perfect for seizing photo opportunities. It also has a video option. It has a rechargeable battery that can be charged right from the camera with the sync cord. This seller had great communication with me. The camera is in perfect shape. Like new. I highly recommend this seller and camera. It's perfectly priced. (Note: it comes with a rechargeable battery, but you will need to buy the sync/charger cord. Cheap enough to buy from Amazon. You should order both at the same time.)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy J. Faria

customer_reviews.title: Lenses auto focus sticks
customer_reviews.text: Camara has an Autofocus Lens sticks when it moves, making the Photos blurry. I perform Home Inspection, each camera comes with one battery and I have maybe 10 or 12 battery - so I have used it many times for many years and I'm filmier with this camera. The seller said this camera was in working order - it is not
customer_reviews.author: Inspector Nick

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a few weeks then stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Camera initially worked as it should but after 3 weeks of occasional use it began turning off after a few seconds after I turned it on, and started not turning on unless the on/off button was pushed for more than 5 seconds. I bought it for our trip to Peru that I now on and it hardly worked during our hike of the Inca trail and now doesn’t stay on at all. Unfortunately the 30-day return policy ended yesterday, the day I finished hiking the Inca trail. I bought a case and extra battery and feel like I wasted my money. R&R, can you hook me up with another used one that isnt defective?
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Abraham

customer_reviews.title: Great point and shoot camera
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very satisfied with the camera, the picture quality is excellent the speed is great. The video is superb and you can zoom in and out while recording, not sure why so many other reviews stated this is not possible, perhaps on the older models you couldn't. The only con I found is its difficult to use the menu in the dark since the button don't light up, (minor issue) and the location of the video button is cumbersome, once you are finished shooting your video its not super easy to stop with out having several seconds of you fumbling for the button at the end of your video.
customer_reviews.author: davea

customer_reviews.title: not real happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used for my grandkids to make videos. Something is wrong or is missing in the memory and the camera freezes at times and has to be shut off and rebooted. Also the flash doesn't work. It works as a toy for the kids but it was advertised as being in good operating condition with everything functioning. I didn't find any of this out until well after the purchase, an with the cost of return shipping was such that I just kept it and didn't return it. Make sure that any used electronic device you buy can be returned or has a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: The Banjo Picker.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix cameras are great
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd S6000 model. Great pocket camera! My first one, I was rough with using on all my remodeling projects, so I somehow damaged it - so the focus is not consistent - so I got one exactly like it as I already have charging cable and 2 batts.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Good compact digital camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a fine camera for my purposes. I still use it. I like the pocket size (I won't carry around a bulkier, heavier camera despite its higher potential quality). Battery life is acceptable, and it's easy to upload photos from the camera to my computer. I find it easier to use than the camera on my cellphone (which produces photos of somewhat inferior quality to those I obtain with this camera). I rarely use the video (results in huge file sizes) or rapid-fire sequence, because the quality of each shot is somewhat inferior to single shots.
customer_reviews.author: syzygy

customer_reviews.title: Great Small Camera
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I am very happy with my camera. I wish the small camera's had a view finder for sunny days. I have not found a good quality small camera with a view finder, so can't knock this camera for not having one. I did not take the time to read the instructions because, we had a birthday party the day I received the camera. I took it out, charged, it and headed for the party. The pics turned out Wonderful. The zoom is easy to use. My hands tend to shake a lot, and this camera corrected the problem. No more fuzzy pics. This is a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: Should have mentioned camera did not come with a memory card. I would have bought one before the camera arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great camera for a great price....
customer_reviews.text: This camera does what it said, If you follow the manual you will not disappointed. One thing that lack is how the battery charge, I preferred charging it from the charger not from the inside the camera. Overall it's pretty good. I don't have any noise when i recorded a video clip, i don't know why people said it make clicking noise! We purchased this camera from Amazon and got 2 days free shipping, yes we ordered monday and got it on wednesday. Thank you Amazon!!!
customer_reviews.author: DIbrahim

customer_reviews.title: Great photos, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd camera purchase in 11 months. I bought this same camera and dropped it on concrete - ooops! I loved it for the picture quality, ease of use and it's ready to shoot quickly, much better than other models. I preferred to buy this model again over the newer one with the touch screen because it is so easy to adjust your settings without messing up the image area with fingerprints. Super camera as an easy extra camera for fun shots.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Noggle

customer_reviews.title: recommended
customer_reviews.text: bought this to take along on vacation as a back up camera(always take two) have been using to get accustom to it ahead of time wanted something small and light weight I usually use a NikonD40 but wanted a small purse size . What I have seen so far this little camera packs a big punch takes great photos. Biggest problem I have is I am so use to holding a larger camera it took some getting use to switching to the small one.Arrived packaged nicely and as promised would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Debrah Little

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera. I find that the picture quality is excellent and the camera is easy to use. It is compact enough to bring with me but not so small that it is difficult to use. I have even found that I can take photos of my pets in certain light with the flash and still avoid pet eye. I like the feature of editing the photos right on the camera and that the new photo is saved as well as the original. I recommend this camera highly.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia Green

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A GREAT LIL CAMERA!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this camera as an upgrade of my older s4000 camera works well was easy to learn and was shipped to me just in time for an event I wanted it for, so far I haven't noticed to much difference in the s4000 and the s6000 but I haven't played with its features much yet. But this camera is just a lil thicker and I do love the champagne color is its really pretty. I'm very happy with my amazon purchase of this camera!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this camera for over 2 years now, and don't have much of any complaints. I originally purchased it as a backup camera to my Nikon DSLR but as things have turned out it gets used a lot more than my DSLR. Its my go-to everyday camera and I couldn't be happier with its performance. This is the 2nd of 3 Nikons I own and who could ask for anything better.
customer_reviews.author: Seawind

customer_reviews.title: Batteries drain fast
customer_reviews.text: Camera is very nice. Great size. Good pictures. After 8 or 9 months we noticed the batteries would drain super fast. Very frustrating. Batteries were changed, several times and they always died. Several times we were in special events and could no longer take pics because the battery died.
customer_reviews.author: Inggy

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had it long & haven't printed up anything. So far I am loving it. Really impressed with the range. I can get really crisp closeups. Would still love a view finder but am resigned to get used to not having one. Can't believe I can get such great clarity in really close ups and then long distance in this tiny camera. So far I am thrilled with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NIKON IS THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is simple to use, fast to turn on, and is always in focus. The only downside to this camera is you almost need a secondary battery so it can be charging while you are using the camera. Every picture I take with this camera is in focus, it doesn't matter if it is of dogs or kids running and playing or any lighting or landscape. The colors show up life like and the pictures have a depth quality when they are developed.
customer_reviews.author: GSXR-Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Love this little camera
customer_reviews.text: I am sure I already reviewed this - it takes beautiful pictures, has many nice settings and I especially love the close ups for flowers. I will add a photo of a picture I took last week - as a picture is worth a thousand words.
customer_reviews.author: boolagirl

customer_reviews.title: Great small camera
customer_reviews.text: I loved this Coolpix camera - it takes great photos and has a great zoom for such a small camera which fits into your pocket. However, the only problem I have with Nikon cameras, and maybe this is actually a digital camera issue, is that they keep getting specs under the lens. Not scratches on the lens itself, but dust/matter inside on the sensor so that dots appear on every picture. It's my second Nikon camera that this has happened to. The first I sent away to repair (which took around 8 weeks, which is not great when you use every day), on this camera it happened after the 1 year warranty expired, so I bought a new camera instead.
customer_reviews.author: Jason in Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: Fast? no...
customer_reviews.text: While picture quality is above average, the speed with which it reliably takes shots varies. If you are expecting a camera you can just point and shoot, think twice about this one. I've found that it occasionally "hangs" while I'm pressing the button. If this is that the camera is recharging to flash or something is out of focus, this is not made plain. There are better cameras available. Memory is terrific, movies are OK (no zoom available after mode activation). Downloading is a breeze. Just not a moderate action camera.
customer_reviews.author: Scooby

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was very excited to receive the camera, but the lens cover only completely closes about 10% of the time. Trying to decide whether to just return and look for another camera or deal with warranty repair/replacement...both will be a hassle and I am disappointed to have to think about this a day after receiving this camera! The couple of photos and video seem very good...
customer_reviews.author: Clancy

customer_reviews.title: love my Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera for everyday use and snapshots. I use this for vacation and family events. It's light and easy to carry. Fits in a pocket. Has great ISO sensitivity, vibration reduction, and a clear screen. Takes wonderful snapshots. It's perfect for when you want to capture a moment easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Spears

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this camera
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. I really wanted a camera that I could charge while downloading the pictures and this one does that. I've gotten some blurry pictues with moving things - like my dog but thats the only thing I don't like 100%. Its pretty fast and I thought it was the best deal out there.
customer_reviews.author: All Around Raleigh Dj

customer_reviews.title: Great for a while...
customer_reviews.text: It took great pictures for 3 years, then just stopped working. I bought a new battery, nothing. I took good care of it, never dropped or even tossed around inside a bag. If you expect things to last, don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: CAtherine Murphy Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Just purchased new Nikon Coolpix Camera
customer_reviews.text: I recently replaced my old digital with the CoolPix camera. I love it! The zoom feature on this camera is so much better than on my old one. The pictures are so sharp and clear. The larger viewing screen makes it easy to see, even without my glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Gal from Paris, TX

customer_reviews.title: Product with issues, poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and another Nikon camera as gifts. This one has gone back to Nikon for warranty repair three months after we got it, as the lense cover would refuse to open. The quality of this camera is poor and the customer service is poor. The other Nikon Coolpix 1100S PJ camera has been at Nikon for over four months and they are now asking that we pay $84 to replace parts that failed shortly after using it. I WILL NEVER BUY ANOTHER NIKON POINT AND SHOOT. Amazon's Customer Service is the Best & NIKON's customer service is the worst!!!!
customer_reviews.author: SVMOJITO

customer_reviews.title: Great little HD camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera. Got is as an anniversary present for my boyfriend, who ended up proposing that weekend! So it was able to capture all the great post-engagment pics of me crying and all the sparkles that the ring has. Captured tiny details which were so important that weekend. He's currently using it to take professional looking photos for action figure reviews and it gives all the detail his readers want. We like it so far. Some of the detailed options are a little difficult, so this is an intermediate camera, I would say, not for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, smooth operation
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy construction, smooth operation, lots of features and good quality pictures. I have a canon SLR, but in the car, riding a bike, canoeing, etc, this small package comes in handy for photos I would have missed - in between an SLR and a smart phone camera
customer_reviews.author: SteveCee23

customer_reviews.title: viewscreen broke easily
customer_reviews.text: The viewscreen on this camera, which I owned for less than a year, broke easily. I don't even know how. I took it to the ballpark, took photos and when I came home, the viewscreen was broken. The camera was easy to use the little I used it. Very disappointed in it. I've had Sony cameras before and since and not broken the viewscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Diane A. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: It was junk had a black spot on the screen ...
customer_reviews.text: It was junk had a black spot on the screen. I send it back. They should have seen that before it was ship. I got my money back. But then the spend shipping back. I am going stay away from refurbish camera.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Waite

customer_reviews.title: COOL PIX IS REALLY COOL
customer_reviews.text: This camera has so many advanced features I doubt I will master them all. You get great results from just the basic settings. I wish it had a "thumb hold" on the front, you have to be very careful to not let it slip out of your hand. Great camera!
customer_reviews.author: WHITECAPS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Received item as described. Camera is functioning well to dte. A+++ seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kalibre45

customer_reviews.title: Tough Camera
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera that is guy proof. We can take it everywhere and it can be dropped, sat on, underwater and still takes great shots!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera for the price. I got this as a gift and I would have to say this is a good point and shoot camera. No, this isn't for the professional photographer but for portability it is fantastic. Always happy with Nikon products.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Quick Shutter and Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a great camera. The shutter is very quick which I like because I want to catch the picture I am seeing immediately. The quality of the photos is great too. Only downside is that it can be a little sensitive to a shaky hand. The pictures can sometimes come out a little blurry if you shake too much and this is worse than some other cameras I have had.
customer_reviews.author: SBenjamin

customer_reviews.title: Best Mother's Day Gift!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for mother's day and I absolutely love it. It is really easy to maneuver through even though there are a LOT of functions! I really wanted the touch screen of the 4000s, but I'm glad I got this one. The scroll wheel is really convenient! The colors are vibrant. It's really hard to get a bad picture with this camera!
customer_reviews.author: N. Tsukada

customer_reviews.title: Geat Product at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We love this camera and Mary loves it so much that I don't even see it anymore or get to use it. You will be very satisfied with it and I may have to buy another if I can't find where Mary has stashed. LOL!
customer_reviews.author: rsjonesco

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S6000
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little feature loaded camera. It takes good quality pictures and videos. I have several larger cameras but they are cumbersome to carry around or travel with. This is a perfect size for the pocket, purse, or carry on luggage. I'm very, very pleased with the performance of this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara LaRue

customer_reviews.title: Excellent compact camera
customer_reviews.text: While a compact camera will never, in my opinion, produce the same quality picture as a good digital SLR, this camera was perfect for those times when a digital SLR is too cumbersome to take along. Recently bought this camera for a trip to Costa Rica and it performed great. Beautiful pictures, many different settings and very light and compact. I will now pass it along to my wife who finds an SLR too heavy and complicated and just wants a good camera to take photos of grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Gary P. Sklaver

customer_reviews.title: Beast small Camera ever
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera previously and lost it in the divorce. When I found this one for this price, even though my ex-wife has taken all my income because she does not have the ability to provide for herself i could get this one.
customer_reviews.author: sony

customer_reviews.title: pocket camera
customer_reviews.text: the Kool Pic Camera is terrific in several ways.....it is light weight, compact, fits easily in one's pocket, has a great battery, focuses well, and has 7x lens. The main disadvantage is, depending on the light you can't see what you are taking a picture of.
customer_reviews.author: G. F. Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. Got it to replace my original which some dopey kid dropped and broke.Picture quality is very good for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Gia Gia

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product, real value for money. The pic qualities are amazing and also the video quality, which is superb. The panoramic option is bit difficult to use, also it take some time to save the file. Else everything is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes nice pictures. It's not as easy to use as my Canon was but due to bad customer service with Canon, I decided on a Nikon. Pretty easy to use though. I'm still getting used to it and figuring out how to use the different features. I had taken a video over the weekend and that turned out pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri A. Mcdannell

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: Amazed what such a small camera can performed with many useful features my previous cameras didn't have. With 14 megapixal quality, I could crop, isolate and enlarge a face to create 8" by 10" excellent quality portraits. Also, achived excellant Panarama scenic photos with this camera and the Panarama software that came with it. I no longer need my other cameras. The S6000 can do everything and it's as easy as a wallet to carry in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Fjlocke

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S6000
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon S6000 is an absolutely fascinating and a too good camera. A brilliant combination of price and quality of 14.2MP and 7X Optical Zoom, the clarity of the photos is too good. It is sturdy too. It once fell out of my hand and hit the iron rods. When I pressed the power button expecting it not to work, lo!! it opened up just fine. Lovely camera and a must buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Debashis

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - great price!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the camera. Also, the delivery was quick and the camera came with a case and extended warranty that I wasn't expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa W.

customer_reviews.title: coolpix review
customer_reviews.text: The camera is pretty easy to use. Doesn't have some features I was expecting. Took longer to receive than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Grace L. Miller

customer_reviews.text: IT WAS FOR MY WIFE I THINK SHE LIKES IT ALOT. I KNOW SHE USES IT ALOT, THE PICS A RE REALY CLEAR
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: Cool camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is full of features and takes very good pictures and videos. The body is not made of metal like the first Coolpix but it is more affordable with newer technologies so I cannot complain. Nikon has to trim the cost somehow to keep the price reasonable. It is a great camera for the non professional photographers.
customer_reviews.author: scutpuppy

customer_reviews.title: Always Canon...First Nikon
customer_reviews.text: Sorry, but this'll be brief. I decided to try a Nikon after many, many years of Canon usage (still have several). This Nikon S6000 seemed like a lot of bang for the buck. My impressions so far: Pro's: Great pics, small size, easy to use, great macro, automatic scene selection, good focal length Con's: Power button too small, takes WAY too long to zoom after turning on, zoom is in large jerky steps so it's hard to find that "right" framing, poor battery/SD cover design - have to latch the door all the time (not spring loaded), flash use not always predictable in certain light. Would I buy it again? Probably not...YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Outbackwack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product as described, will do business with in the future.
customer_reviews.author: nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pics
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awsome. I love the pics it takes. Very nice camera at a very accesible price. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karucha

customer_reviews.title: EXCELENT CAMERA !
customer_reviews.text: Nikon is a great camera brand, you'll never fail buying any of these cameras. all are perfect !!!! . .
customer_reviews.author: Carlos.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The camera was in very good condition and contained a 16 GB Memory Card and a rechargeable battery.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: I simply love the camera. Amazing pictures with superb clarity! Video is great too! I must say that I got much value than the money I paid!
customer_reviews.author: ashishmarwal

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it is not worth buying this product. For the quality of the images this camera should cost less than $ 100. The pictures always came out blurry. I bought it because of the positive reviews but I returned immediately! Do not buy it, avoid the hassle of dealing with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bell

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! Good quality of photo and video. Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Renat

customer_reviews.title: A great upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for my sister for Christmas. We both have other models of Coolpix cameras but she was looking for more zoom. These cameras are easy to operate and offer a wide range of options. This gift was the perfect one.
customer_reviews.author: Kyre

customer_reviews.title: great little camera
customer_reviews.text: I have used this camera a bit and just loved using it. I own a SLR digital camera but I did not want to travel with such a large camera. This camera was easy to carry, to use and took good pictures
customer_reviews.author: Happyfeet

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use takes great photos and all the setting are fun to experiment with. Just one annoyance the lense extends even when you just want to view the stored photos.
customer_reviews.author: do

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality for this price range
customer_reviews.text: Takes clear pics, easy to use. Only complain is that it doesn't take a good night pics even with the night mode, but with this price, I can't complain much. I mostly take my 2 year old boy with this camera and it does well enough job.
customer_reviews.author: Maquiash

customer_reviews.title: The camera matches all my expectations
customer_reviews.text: I did a great deal of research before purchasing the Nikon Coolpix. I needed macro capability, a large viewing screen, vibration reduction and fast zooming for composition. So far the Nikon Coolpix S6000 has met my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Jak

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy :(
customer_reviews.text: This camera has great specs, however I am not happy with its picture quality. Every pic I took had red-eye problems even after reading the entire manual and adjusting all of the settings I could not get a desirable result. It does alright outside but... inside it produces very dark grainy pics. I am returning this product and sticking with my old reliable Vanon A540.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Good Camera
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this camera very long yet but it looks like it is easy to use and I like the color selections - I have been wanting a camera that does black and white pictures -So looks like I will really like this one-
customer_reviews.author: Rich Hill

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very dissappointed in this camera. It takes very blurred pictures if the subject moves at all. I expected more from a Nikon, I am giving this one to my 5yr old grandson and going back to Cannon.
customer_reviews.author: mskitty

customer_reviews.title: A Marvel
customer_reviews.text: The product is a marvel of its kind. In such a small budget, getting a high end camera is like beyond imagination. The ease with which it takes photos makes it a child gadget. I bought it for my cousin. He will be surely overjoyed. Nikon has always proved to be the No. 1 in the camera market.
customer_reviews.author: Anandi Dass

customer_reviews.title: nikon camera review
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera for the price. Not as easy to figure out what settings to use for which picture taking situation. Pictures are clear and nice color.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Camera
customer_reviews.text: I am no technie but after a little practice at home, I was able to photograph a horse racing competition. I took it off Auto focus, used Tracking and got some wonderful action shots. The small size was one of the reasons for buying this camera and it fits nicely in my jacket pocket.
customer_reviews.author: nelle

customer_reviews.title: service not good
customer_reviews.text: the camera arrived in a crumpled box. I had a feeling it had been used although it was in new packages but the box was so worn out... Also, it was my understanding that the memory card would be in the order... it was not. The shipper said that part of the order would come later... it never did. Now I have to order the memory card separately. If it was not part of the order, it should have been clarified earlier. Worst of all, the price of this camera at Costco was so much better... I feel that I spent my money in vain.
customer_reviews.author: cleo

customer_reviews.title: Photo OK, Video so so
customer_reviews.text: Thi camera is nice, light and handy. The screen is good. Easy to find the commands and menus are simple. It would have been better with a separate charger for the battery. But battery life is ok. The photo quality is ok. Sharp pictures and colorful. The camera is snappy but between photos with flash, it can take up to 10-15 sec between each shot...And zooming could be slow some times. The video quality is not so great even if this Nikon S6000 shoots in HD resolution you can see the video image is not sharp. Low light condition the video is kind dark. Quality is not as good. But considering the price of this camera overall this is ok.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tranie

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: First of all great delivery from Amazon. Great camera and I am very much satisfied with quality of this camera. Options are bit cumbersome to look for otherwise camera is great.
customer_reviews.author: common man

customer_reviews.title: gr8 pics....gr8 camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is gr8. has a lot of features and takes really clear, quality photos. my husband loves it as e have a 7 month old daughter and he's taking pics of her everyday... 1 downside though is that the panoramic feature doesnt work as i thought u have 2 take 3 separate pics and then it will combine it. i wanted 1 continuous shot.
customer_reviews.author: Tash

customer_reviews.title: nikon s6000
customer_reviews.text: great camera! i am totally pleased with quality of pics and the overall use of this camera. it takes the pics fast. and it fits in my pocket. A+
customer_reviews.author: joose

customer_reviews.title: It's what you make it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. It can be totaly automatic or manual on the setting. Clear pictures with no noise. I am having trouble with the macro setting. I like taking close up nature pictures. I'll have to keep playing to get it right. Overall , great camera, great quality.
customer_reviews.author: T. Jobczynski

customer_reviews.title: Died within a few months of use.
customer_reviews.text: I'd only used this camera for a few months, when it died while I was taking pictures one day. I was simply holding it, snapping away when a poof of smoke came out of it and spiraled upwards, and then it just turned itself off. Considering my old Nikon coolpix only lasted 2 years and then gave up the ghost I was really miffed that I had now spent over $400 on these things and neither were of any decent quality. I even had a case for this one!
customer_reviews.author: J. Buchholz

customer_reviews.title: camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera takes great pictures and the battery last for a long time. I have no complaints about this camera.
customer_reviews.author: gslobo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Ordered with ease, Arrived on time estimated, and as shown, I dont like being required to put in a certain amount of words for review!!!
customer_reviews.author: T-Way

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera !
customer_reviews.text: I have been a serious amature photographer for 40 years and have to say that this point and shoot camera is doing every thing that I am asking of it.As always good Nikon glass.The menu is easy to use.No problem with battery cover coming open.300 photos in the 2 months that I have owned this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this camera!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this camera for 6 months. At first, it was pretty good. Great pictures. The only major problem was how many seconds on average it would take to shoot several pictures in a row, but I dealt with it. THEN....the shutter only started 'half way' opening, similar to some of the other reviews. So I decide, I've had it less than 1 year, I'll send it to Nikon for warranty coverage. Once it got there, Nikon customer service was HORRIBLE. I will never buy another Nikon again. Kodak is better :-(
customer_reviews.author: Carol Jones

customer_reviews.title: A Gem of a camera
customer_reviews.text: The S6000 is the best Nikon I have owned. It is very compact and for close to an amateur the ease of use is as remarkable as the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great camera - easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. Very easy to use. Picture quality is excellent. I currently have a 10MP Canon and bought this one for my wife. It's so much better than the one I have, I am trading up and getting one of these. :)
customer_reviews.author: Dave K.

customer_reviews.title: Travel Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Nikon camera, the point and shoot type. It is an excellent camera and the only thing that is lacking is it not having a view finder. However since it was a gift and it was picked out by me, I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but spend a little more for the s8100 which is AWESOME.
customer_reviews.text: This model is ok - not terrible, but not good enough for me to keep. While it was good for outdoor shots, it's definitely not a good flash camera. If you have a little extra to spend, I would suggest getting the Nikon s8100 - it is AWESOME - easy to use, great zoom, great flash shots, great low light shots. Totally worth the extra cost (and its the #1 rated Consumer reports point-n-shoot camera). All in all, I would recommend getting either a cheaper camera, or more expensive camera.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Augustinack

customer_reviews.title: Nikon S6000 Point and Shoot Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very good, but I should have paid more for more zoom power. Could have a stronger case. Suggest buying a good carrying case. Otherwise, lens is usual Nikon quality - great.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very sleek and attractive camera
customer_reviews.text: The Nikon S6000 is a very compact and user friendly camera. Unfortunately it may take a few times before you can capture a clear shot but other than that issue, I see this camera as great point and shoot device.
customer_reviews.author: Engelbert

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: This camera does everything i expected of it and more.. i bought it for my girlfriend on her birthday and she absolutely loves it as well..
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Sosa-saney

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Review
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from this camera. I will not say it's bad but it doesn`t respond as fast as others in its category and the battery is a nightmare: it has low duration.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Jaime Vasquez Mejia (V000179)

customer_reviews.title: Poor excution of photos
customer_reviews.text: The auto focus does not work well, can't take action photos, even with the proper settings the camera does not work well inside. Find another camera. Very disappointed in this one.
customer_reviews.author: mrvids

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choise
customer_reviews.text: I think its a perfect choice for non-professional takers, it is the best product for taking photo easily and with quality.
customer_reviews.author: MURAT VZMEN

customer_reviews.title: Shame on you Nikon.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the pictures are pretty good but for goodness sakes the Nikon View and Nikon Transfer software is terrible. And, Nikon, how could you design worse access port covers for the battery, memory chip and transfer cable! I use a Nikon D200 for professional photography and got the S6000 as an emergency back up camera.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O. Mead

customer_reviews.title: check it out
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much, sharp, easy to use. P. S. Still looking witch card & case to get for it. John E. Clements
customer_reviews.author: jecsr34

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: Hi, I'm new with Digital Cameras but I really loved this one. It is very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Obaidan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera.. This one was slower when u pushed to take pic.(then mine I had)
customer_reviews.author: debbie miller

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new camera! I got it for my birthday in May and have been using it nonstop. Takes great pictures. Very nice and small, easy to use. I got it because it did not have a million buttons that I had no clue what they did.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy H

customer_reviews.title: decent DC
customer_reviews.text: it is quite good for the prize,although sometimes i'm not 100% satisfied with the pic quality when compare to $800 ones..well,it is silly anyway,i give it a five-star
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: worked beautifully for ALMOST 3 WEEKS!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped turning on...when I turned it over to read the serial number (required to return it for service after 3 weeks), why was I not surprised to read "MADE IN CHINA"? This is junk, plain and simple
customer_reviews.author: N. K. Hersh

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures until it shuts off a minute into using it, but its small & convenient i guess..... Only one major problem.
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to use it, the only problem.... It constantly shuts off in the middle of viewing pictures taking pictures, anything you do it shuts off. I bought it new... Its not that I didn't charge it either. It was fully charged and still shutting itself off constantly. 3 months into having it, I can no longer use it because I turn the power on and it shuts down immediately after turning on. Not satisfied at all. I paid way too much to only have a camera for 2 1/2 months.
customer_reviews.author: cf

customer_reviews.title: Not a must have camera!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera just because I needed a date/time stamp on the picture and none of Sony cameras has that feature. I would not recommend this product to anyone unless you are a moron and do not know anything about a camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lohi
